sentences.en: A strong gust of wind blew the car sideways into the ditch.
sentences.cn: 一阵狂风把汽车横着掀进了沟里。

sentences.en: Alfred shot him a sideways glance.
sentences.cn: 艾尔弗雷德斜眼瞥了他一下。

sentences.en: Bring the table through the door sideways.
sentences.cn: 把这张桌子侧过来搬进门去.

sentences.en: He looked sideways at me in the meeting.
sentences.cn: 他在会议上斜着眼看我.

sentences.en: He scrambled sideways down the scree slope.
sentences.cn: 他沿着碎石坡的一侧爬了下来。

sentences.en: He was knocked sideways by the result.
She darted a sly sideways glance at Bramwell.
sentences.cn: 她狡黠地从眼角瞥了布拉姆韦尔一眼。

sentences.en: She twisted her head sideways and looked towards the door.
Slabs of rock had slipped sideways in the remote past, and formed this hole.
sentences.cn: 在久远的过去，岩石板滑落到周边，从而形成了这个洞。

sentences.en: The boy gave the girl a sideways look.
sentences.cn: 这男孩斜视了那姑娘一眼.

sentences.en: The car skidded and slewed sideways.
They brought the piano sideways through the front door.
sentences.cn: 他们把钢琴侧着从前门抬进来。

sentences.en: When he let go the head lolled sideways.
sentences.cn: 他一放手，脑袋便垂向一侧。

words.tran_cn: 支持（side的现在分词）；给…装上侧面；收拾，整理

phrases.tran_cn: 从一边（或一侧）；朝向一边（或一侧）

trans.tran_cn: 斜着，斜向一边，以侧面对着
从一边， 向一边； 在一边； 斜着， 侧身
